job_details.Vacaturetitel: Machine Learning Engineer II - Central ML
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy in collaboration with scientists, scalable machine learning models and algorithms that provide content related insights and generative AI applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
     * Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
     * Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications.
     * Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments. Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.
     * Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.
     * Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer II - Central ML

* Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy in collaboration with scientists, scalable machine learning models and algorithms that provide content related insights and generative AI applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
     * Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
     * Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications.
     * Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments. Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.
     * Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.
     * Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes generative AI development, including working with GPT variants and contributing to creative content generation and Q&A applications. It also highlights the integration of these models into production systems and the development of end-to-end services, aligning strongly with the responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy in collaboration with scientists, scalable machine learning models and algorithms that provide content related insights and generative AI applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models and algorithms, including generative AI applications, which is core to the modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states contribution to the development of generative models like GPT variants for various applications, fitting the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of ML models into production systems and ensuring efficient inference, which are key software development tasks for deploying AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.
job_tasks.justification: This mentions collaboration with DevOps for implementing monitoring and maintenance strategies, which is a core aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.
job_tasks.justification: This describes end-to-end service ownership including monitoring health, performance, and metrics, which falls under operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on writing clean, scalable code for production environments and mentions CI/CD, which are software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions, indicating business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
job_tasks.justification: This involves evaluating architectural solutions for models, considering technical requirements and business constraints, which is part of the modeling process.
